description: NASA’s Webb Telescope detects a hidden atmosphere on ultra-hot super-Earth TOI-561 b, revealing gases above its molten surface, challenging previous assumptions about small planets surviving intense stellar radiation.
title: Webb Telescope Discovers Hidden Atmosphere on Molten Super-Earth TOI-561 b Despite Extreme Heat

description: All Her Fault is a Sarah Snook starrer thriller drama that revolves around a mother who arrives at an address only to find out his son is missing
title: All Her Fault Now Streaming on JioHotstar: Know Everything About This Thriller Series

description: Astronomers observed a neutron star known as P13 suddenly brighten after years of inactivity. The decade-long study shows how changes in accretion can drive extreme X-ray power, offering new insight into ultraluminous X-ray sources and neutron star physics.
title: Astronomers Watch a Dormant Neutron Star Reignite After a Decade of Silence

description: A Starlink satellite narrowly avoided a collision after a spacecraft launched by a Chinese rocket passed within 200 meters in orbit. SpaceX warned that the incident highlights growing safety risks caused by poor coordination as Earth’s orbital environment becomes increasingly crowded with satellites.
title: Chinese Spacecraft Nearly Slammed Into Starlink Satellite, SpaceX Reveals

description: New research shows time on Mars runs faster than on Earth by 477 microseconds per day. The variation poses challenges for astronauts, navigation, and creating interplanetary communication networks. Scientists say understanding Martian time differences is key for future missions and testing Einstein’s relativity.
title: Clocks on Mars Run Faster Than on Earth, New Study Finds

description: Data-driven forecasting can help governments and companies make better clean energy investment decisions. Involving stakeholders and validating models improves reliability and increases success in climate, economic, and societal outcomes.
title: Predictive Forecasting Tools Can Boost the Success of Clean Energy Investments Worldwide

description: Created by Rebecca Perry Cutter, The Hunting Wives is an intense thriller TV series that has finally landed on Netflix. The series is packed with suspense, mystery, and thriller
title: The Hunting Wives Out on OTT: Know Everything About This American Thriller Mystery Series

description: Wednesday Season 3 is among the most anticipated upcoming OTT releases, with fans eagerly awaiting updates on filming schedules, cast reunions, and plot developments. The series has remained consistently in the spotlight due to its unique gothic style, strong performances, and engaging storytelling.
title: Wednesday Season 3 Set for July 2027 on Netflix: Jenna Ortega Returns as the Iconic Addams Heir

description: Written and directed by Nikolas Red, Posthouse is a psychological horror film that revolves around a failed editor seeking to complete his deceased father’s incomplete silent horror film. The sequences are chilling and nerve-wrenching
title: Posthouse Now Available to Stream on Netflix: Know Everything About This Psychological Thriller Film

description: Daksha: The Deadly Conspiracy tells the story of Daksha, an investigative officer who unravels a dark network of political crimes that intertwine with supernatural forces. Released in September 2024, the film received praise for Lakshmi Manchu’s commanding performance and its sharp social commentary on power and corruption.
title: Lakshmi Manchu’s Daksha: The Deadly Conspiracy Available for Streaming on Amazon Prime Video

description: A Jio matching number allows users to choose a mobile number that follows a familiar digit pattern, such as matching the last few digits of an existing number. Available through Jio’s online platforms and retail stores, the option is designed for convenience rather than exclusivity, with pricing depending on availability and demand.
title: Jio Matching Number: What Is It and How to Get It?

description: Are you looking for budget earbuds priced under Rs. 2,000? Here we have curated the five best options currently available in India. If you're in the market for affordable TWS earphones on a budget, the list of options you can consider includes Realme Buds T200, OnePlus Nord Buds 3, Redmi Buds 5A, Noise Buds F1 and Honor Choice Earbuds X5.
title: Best Earbuds Under Rs. 2,000 in India: OnePlus Nord Buds 3, Redmi Buds 5A, Noise Buds F1, More

description: Here's a ZEISS perspective on why AI photography is both love and a challenge. ZEISS’s Oliver Schindelbeck talks to Gadgets 360 on Vivo and ZEISS collaboration. He explains why reliability trumps features in flagship optics. The Vivo X300 and X300 Pro were launched in India earlier this month, and both phones sport ZEISS-tuned cameras.
title: Five Years In, Vivo and ZEISS Navigate the Fine Line Between Photography and Art

description: Lenovo has launched the Idea Tab Plus in India as a more premium option alongside the Idea Tab. It comes in 8GB and 12GB RAM variants, both with 256GB storage and a MediaTek Dimensity 6400 chip. The tablet features a 12.1-inch 2.5K display, a 10,200mAh battery with 45W charging and ships with the Tab Pen. Prices start at Rs. 27,999, with sales beginning on December 22.
title: Lenovo Idea Tab Plus Launched in India With 12.1-Inch Display, 10,200mAh Battery: Price, Specifications

description: Redmi Note 15 5G is scheduled to launch in India on January 6, 2026. The smartphone will debut in the country nearly a month after its unveiling in select global markets. The handset is confirmed to go on sale in India via Amazon, the smartphone maker had recently announced. While there are still a few weeks left for its India launch, the dedicated microsite for the Redmi Note 15 5G has been updated to reveal that it will be powered by a Snapdragon 6 Gen 3 SoC, which is the same its global counterpart.
title: Redmi Note 15 5G Chipset Confirmed Ahead of January 6 Launch in India: Expected Features, Specifications

description: Truecaller is a caller identification service that allows users to check the details of unknown callers before they pick up the call. While this helps people identify spam and scam calls, it also requires them to have their phone number registered with the platform so that others can view their details, too. Not everyone is comfortable with the idea of having their data publicly available. For this purpose, Truecaller allows users to deactivate their account and unlist their phone numbers from the company database.
title: How to Delete Your Truecaller Account and Unlist Number Using Different Methods Online: A Step-By-Step Guide

description: Xiaomi 17 Ultra could launch on December 26, with a new leak suggesting it won’t be launching alone. A tipster has revealed that Xiaomi will unveil the Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 Elite-powered flagship alongside two new mid-range Redmi smartphones, likely the Redmi Turbo 5 and Turbo 5 Pro. The company could also announce a new smartwatch, two pairs of earphones and a tablet alongside the Xiaomi 17 Ultra.
title: Xiaomi 17 Ultra Tipped to Launch Alongside Redmi Turbo 5 Series, New Wearables

description: Knives Out is a critically acclaimed American mystery film directed by Rian Johnson that reinvents the classic whodunit with sharp humor, a gothic atmosphere, and a stellar ensemble cast, making it a standout modern crime drama. The story is quite a gripping one with further sequels after this. It is based on. Murder mystery that is investigated by the eccentric detective who deals with a dysfunctional family.
title: Knives Out Now Streaming on Lionsgate Play: What You Need to Know

description: The Motorola Edge 70 features a premium design. The handset features a 6.7-inch 1.5K pOLED display with a 120Hz screen refresh rate. The device is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 processor. You also get 50-megapixel cameras on both front and rear. The Motorola Edge 70 features a 5,000mAh battery with 68W fast charging support. Here’s everything you need to know about the latest Motorola smartphone.
title: Motorola Edge 70 First Impressions

description: Mrs Deshpande is a highly anticipated Indian psychological thriller series starring Madhuri Dixit as a serial killer aiding police to catch a copycat, premiering on JioHotstar on December 19, 2025. Directed by Nagesh Kukunoor and adapted from the French series La Mante, the show promises intense drama, emotional depth, and suspenseful storytelling that marks Dixit’s bold return to OTT after several years.
title: Mrs Deshpande OTT Release Date: Madhuri Dixit’s Psychological Thriller Premieres on This Date

description: Written by Jaime Vaca, Tell Me Softly is a Spanish teen romance drama that has finally landed on the digital screens.
title: Tell Me Softly Out on OTT: Everything You Need to Know About This Spanish Teen Romance Film

description: The Copenhagen Test has generated early interest among viewers who favor intelligent thrillers and political dramas. Its premise has sparked discussion around moral responsibility, surveillance, and the psychological cost of decision-making in intelligence systems. The involvement of a high-profile cast and respected producers has added to industry attention, positioning the series as a compelling addition to the espionage genre.
title: The Copenhagen Test OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: A global RAM shortage is beginning to reshape the smartphone market, with a tipster claiming that 16GB RAM variants could disappear in 2026. To manage rising memory costs, brands may cut specifications or revive 4GB RAM models beyond entry-level phones. Prices are also expected to rise, as manufacturers prioritise margins amid supply constraints driven largely by AI-related demand.
title: The End of 16GB RAM Phones? AI Boom Forces Smartphone Makers to Bring Back 4GB Models

description: Vivo S50 series, which comprises the vanilla Vivo S50 and Vivo S50 Pro Mini, has been launched in China by the smartphone maker. The handsets succeed the Vivo S30 and Vivo S30 Pro Mini. Both handsets ship with redesigned rear camera modules. While the Pro Mini model gets a horizontal pill-shaped deco, housing triple cameras, the standard model sports a square-shaped rear camera module. The Vivo S50 Pro Mini is powered by Qualcomm's latest Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 SoC, which is built on a 3nm process.
title: Vivo S50 Pro Mini Launched With Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 SoC, Vivo S50 Tags Along: Price, Specifications

description: Apple Fitness+ was launched in India on Monday. The health and wellness subscription service from the Cupertino-based tech giant is said to help users with their workouts. Subscribers can get access to trainer-guided workout videos, track their workout real-time metrics, and earn rewards for goal accomplishments — all through the Apple Fitness app.
title: Apple Fitness+ Now Available in India With Custom Workout Programmes: Price and Other Details

description: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 has received a new major update right after winning Game of the Year and eight other honours at The Game Awards 2025. The "Thank You" update adds new content, tougher boss fights, a photo mode, and other quality-of-life improvements.
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 Gets New 'Thank You' Update After Winning at The Game Awards

description: Google's End of Year Sale has been kicked off and will be live till January 2, 2026, in India. During the sale event, the tech giant is offering the Pixel 10 series, Pixel 9 lineup, Pixel Buds Pro 2, and the Pixel Watch 3 at discounted prices. Moreover, the company is allowing customers to get cashback offers and opt for interest-free EMI options of up to 24 months on select smartphones. Customers can get a cashback of up to Rs. 10,000 on Pixel 10 Pro, Pixel 10 Pro Fold, and Pixel 10 Pro XL, on select credit cards.
title: Pixel 10 Series, Pixel Accessories Get Price Cuts in India During Google's End of Year Sale

description: Samsung is reportedly in talks with AMD to manufacture future CPUs using its 2nm foundry process. The partnership could be finalised by January 2026, with Samsung first producing a prototype chip to meet AMD’s performance targets. The report suggests AMD is exploring Samsung as an alternative to TSMC, which has recently raised manufacturing costs. If confirmed, it would add AMD to Samsung’s growing list of major foundry partners.
title: Samsung Could Reportedly Strike a Deal With AMD to Build Future 2nm Process Chipsets

description: Amazon has revealed the most popular Alexa questions Indian users asked the voice assistant this year. In 2025, the tech giant said K-pop artists BTS, Jennie, and Blackpink were among the top musicians Alexa customers asked general information about. On top of this, Alexa catered to the queries of customers about famous personalities like Virat Kohli, Cristiano Ronaldo, Lionel Messi, and Shah Rukh Khan. Beyond entertainment, Alexa was used for questions related to general knowledge.
title: Alexa's Popular Requests in 2025 Included K-Pop, Bollywood, Podcasts and Details About Celebrities

description: Amazon has introduced an AI feature called Ask this Book to the Kindle app on iOS. It lets readers ask questions about their current or past books and get spoiler-free answers. Users can query plot points, characters or highlighted passages without breaking their reading flow. The feature is currently limited to English books in the US, with Android and Kindle device support planned for next year.
title: Amazon Introduces Ask This Book AI Feature for the Kindle App, Provides Spoiler-Free Answers

description: Logitech MX Master 4 has been launched in India as the latest addition to the MX Master Series. As per the company, the mouse is designed for demanding workflows and is aimed at creative professionals, developers, and business users. A key addition to the MX Master 4 is the new Actions Ring, a digital overlay enabled through Logi Options+. It features an 8,000 DPI sensor for smooth and accurate tracking.
title: Logitech MX Master 4 Launched in India With 8,000 DPI Sensor and Multi-Pairing Support

description: MacBook Air (2025) is currently available in India via Amazon with up to Rs. 10,000 discount. The laptop, which is powered by Apple's M4 processor, is offered in four colourways and two display sizes. The base variant sports a 13-inch Super Retina display and offers 16GB of RAM and 264GB of built-in storage. It is equipped with a 53.8Wh battery with 70W wired fast charging support. Apart from the direct price cut, the e-commerce giant is also allowing customers to get an additional discount of credit cards of ICICI Bank and SBI.
title: MacBook Air (2025) With M4 Chip Available With Over Rs. 10,000 Discount in India: Here Are the Details

description: Oppo Reno 15c was launched in China with a Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 chipset and a 6,500mAh battery. The new phone comes in three colour options, with 12GB of RAM and up to 512GB of storage. The Oppo Reno 15c features a 6.59-inch display and has a triple rear camera unit comprising two 50-megapixel sensors. It has an IP66, IP68 and IP69 rated build.
title: Oppo Reno 15c Launched With Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 SoC, 6,500mAh Battery: Price, Specifications

description: The technology behind Chance AI relies on open-source vision-language models (VLMs) ranging from 3 to 74 billion parameters, which the team post-trains to suit specific user needs. However, building a camera-first platform in an era of data privacy laws like GDPR comes with heavy responsibilities. To address this, the company adds several data protection layers.
title: How Chance AI Is Taking On Google Lens With a Curiosity-First Vision Agent, Explains Dr. Zeng

description: Motorola Edge 70 has been launched in India, the tech firm announced on Monday. The new smartphone will go on sale in the country via an e-commerce platform, the company website, and select offline retail stores in three colourways. The phone is powered by a Snapdragon 7 series chipset, paired with a 5,000mAh Silicon Carbon battery. It features 68W wired and 15W wireless fast charging support, too. The Edge 70 is equipped with a 50-megapixel triple rear camera setup, coupled with an LED flash. It measures 5.99mm in thickness, while weighing about 159g.
title: Motorola Edge 70 Launched in India With 5,000mAh Battery, 50-Megapixel Triple Rear Cameras: Price, Specifications

description: Samsung is tipped to increase the prices of Galaxy A series smartphones in India by Rs. 1,000. The price of Galaxy A56 is said to go up by Rs. 2,000. The rising cost of memory chips could be the reason for this price hike. However, the Samsung Galaxy A56 5G is currently listed on the company's official website in India at its original launch price.
title: Samsung Galaxy A56 Price in India Set to Increase Soon Alongside Other A Series Models, Tipster Claims

description: Star Wars: Fate of the Old Republic was announced at The Game Awards 2025. The game action RPG is confirmed to be in the early stages of development. Game director Casey Hudson, however, has confirmed that Fate of the Old Republic would be launched before 2030.
title: Star Wars: Fate of the Old Republic Will Launch Before 2030, Game Director Confirms

description: OpenAI has reportedly confirmed the tentative release timeline of ChatGPT’s adult mode. According to a report, the company’s CEO of Applications, Fidji Simo, revealed that adult-exclusive features in the artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot could arrive by the first quarter of 2025. However, the rollout is dependent on whether the AI giant can ready its age verification system in time.
title: ChatGPT Adult Mode to Reportedly Be Rolled Out in 2026, to Participate in Erotic Roleplays

description: OnePlus 15R India launch is a few days away. The handset will debut alongside the OnePlus Pad Go 2. It is confirmed to be available in the country via Amazon and the OnePlus India online store in Charcoal Black, Mint Green, and Electric Violet colourways. While the tech firm has teased various specifications of the upcoming phone, its pricing in India remains under wraps. However, a tipster has leaked the same online, along with the handset’s RAM and storage configurations.
title: OnePlus 15R Price in India, Storage Configurations Leaked Days Before Launch in India

description: Reliance Jio has updated its website with new recharge options ranging from data add-ons to annual subscriptions, with OTT access and AI service integration. The monthly Happy New Year plan, priced at Rs. 500, offers 28 days of validity and 2GB of data per day. It also offers unlimited voice calls and 100 SMS per day. The plan includes a bundle of streaming services
title: Reliance Jio Launches Happy New Year 2026 Plans With Unlimited 5G Access, Google Gemini Pro
